  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity

  • public class GameOfLifeActivity
extends Activity
    Purpose:
    Starts the Game of Life view
    Description:
    Capture any touch gestures on the view to control game actions
    Version:
    23 Jan 2013
    Author:
    Shaun Taheri
